description: A defined artificial seawater medium for growing bacteria.
before_start: Acid wash all glassware with 10% HCl and rinse well with dH2O.
guidelines: Increase or decrease amount proportionally to prepare stock quantities as needed. Add dry reagents slowly to allow for dissolution in between each addition. Solutions will be prepared and autoclaved separately, except for carbon and vitamins which are filter sterilized through 0.2 micron PES membranes. Each autoclaved solution should be cooled completely before combining - remember to autoclave extra bottles or graduated cylinders as needed for measuring and mixing. The carbon source should only be added after autoclaved solutions have cooled; it is filter sterilized into the medium and can be added during mixing or at any time before setting up a culture. Extra solutions can be stored frozen or at 4 Celsius. This recipe is for preparing 1 L of liquid medium, but plates can be made as well with slight variation.
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Add 20 g Sigma Sea Salts into a 1 L glass bottle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20 g Sigma Sea Salts into a 1 L glass bottle.

components.data: Add 699 mL dH2O to sea salts in bottle and mix well to dissolve.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 699 mL dH2O to sea salts in bottle and mix well to dissolve.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Add a stir bar to bottle if needed to mix and dissolve salts.
source_data.thread_text: Add a stir bar to bottle if needed to mix and dissolve salts.
source_data.body: Add a stir bar to bottle if needed to mix and dissolve salts.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Remember if adding Bacto Agar that this will not dissolve until solution is autoclaved.
source_data.thread_text: Remember if adding Bacto Agar that this will not dissolve until solution is autoclaved.
source_data.body: Remember if adding Bacto Agar that this will not dissolve until solution is autoclaved.

components.data: Add 50 mg FeEDTA into a 250 mL glass bottle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 50 mg FeEDTA into a 250 mL glass bottle.

components.data: Add 100 mL dH2O to FeEDTA in bottle and mix well to dissolve.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 100 mL dH2O to FeEDTA in bottle and mix well to dissolve.

components.data: Add 150 mL of 1 M Tris HCl, pH 7.5, into a 1 L glass bottle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 150 mL of 1 M Tris HCl, pH 7.5, into a 1 L glass bottle.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 5 of Minimal Basal Medium

components.data: Add 0.34 g NH4Cl into the same bottle and dissolve.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 0.34 g NH4Cl into the same bottle and dissolve.

components.data: Add 182.98 mg K2HPO4 into the same bottle and dissolve.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 182.98 mg K2HPO4 into the same bottle and dissolve.

components.data: Add 375 mL dH2O to the same bottle and mix well.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 375 mL dH2O to the same bottle and mix well.

components.data: Autoclave each of the 3 prepared solutions (Sea salt solution, FeEDTA stock, and basal medium).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Autoclave each of the 3 prepared solutions (Sea salt solution, FeEDTA stock, and basal medium).

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Remember to throw in extra bottles and/or graduated cyclinders if needed.
source_data.thread_text: Remember to throw in extra bottles and/or graduated cyclinders if needed.
source_data.body: Remember to throw in extra bottles and/or graduated cyclinders if needed.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Don't forget to loosen the lids before and tighten the lids after!
source_data.thread_text: Don't forget to loosen the lids before and tighten the lids after!
source_data.body: Don't forget to loosen the lids before and tighten the lids after!

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 12 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Do not combine the 3 solutions before autoclaving.
source_data.thread_text: Do not combine the 3 solutions before autoclaving.
source_data.body: Do not combine the 3 solutions before autoclaving.

source_data.description: Cool autoclaved solutions to room temperature.

components.data: Add 50 mL of FeEDTA stock to the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 50 mL of FeEDTA stock to the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.

components.data: Add 250 mL basal medium to the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 250 mL basal medium to the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.
Store prepared medium at 4 Celsius.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 17 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Prepared medium can be filtered (0.2 micron PES membrane) as needed to remove any precipitates that may form over time.
source_data.thread_text: Prepared medium can be filtered (0.2 micron PES membrane) as needed to remove any precipitates that may form over time.
source_data.body: Prepared medium can be filtered (0.2 micron PES membrane) as needed to remove any precipitates that may form over time.

components.data: Add 1 mL of vitamin supplement the the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 mL of vitamin supplement the the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.

source_data.guidelines: Glassware should be acid-washed and rinsed well with dH2O before use. If unable to measure small quantities accurately, either scale up the recipe or prepare stock solutions of the individual compounds.

components.data: Measure 950 mL dH2O into a 1 L glass bottle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Measure 950 mL dH2O into a 1 L glass bottle.
Dissolve 2 mg biotin into the bottle.

components.data: Dissolve 2 mg folic acid into the bottle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dissolve 2 mg folic acid into the bottle.
Dissolve 10 mg pyridoxine-HCl into the bottle.
Dissolve 5 mg riboflavin into the bottle.
Dissolve 5 mg thiamine into the bottle.

components.data: Dissolve 5 mg nicotinic acid into the bottle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dissolve 5 mg nicotinic acid into the bottle.

components.data: Dissolve 5 mg pantothenic acid into the bottle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dissolve 5 mg pantothenic acid into the bottle.
Dissolve 0.1 mg cyanocobalamin into the bottle.
Dissolve 5 mg p-aminobenzoic acid into the bottle.

components.data: Bring final volume to 1 L with dH2O.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Bring final volume to 1 L with dH2O.

components.data: Filter sterilize final vitamin solution through a 0.2 micron PES membrane.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter sterilize final vitamin solution through a 0.2 micron PES membrane.
Store frozen in 1 mL aliquots.

components.data: Set prepared sea salt solution aside until ready to autoclave.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set prepared sea salt solution aside until ready to autoclave.

components.data: Set prepared FeEDTA stock aside until ready to autoclave.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set prepared FeEDTA stock aside until ready to autoclave.

components.data: Set prepared basal medium aside until ready to autoclave.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set prepared basal medium aside until ready to autoclave.

components.data: A carbon source can be added to the finished minimal medium.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: A carbon source can be added to the finished minimal medium.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 18 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Carbon source (type and concentration) can be varied as needed.
source_data.thread_text: Carbon source (type and concentration) can be varied as needed.
source_data.body: Carbon source (type and concentration) can be varied as needed.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 18 of Minimal Basal Medium
source_data.annotation: Carbon source stock solution should be filter-sterilized through a 0.2 micron PES membrane and stored frozen until needed.
source_data.thread_text: Carbon source stock solution should be filter-sterilized through a 0.2 micron PES membrane and stored frozen until needed.
source_data.body: Carbon source stock solution should be filter-sterilized through a 0.2 micron PES membrane and stored frozen until needed.
